title: What do you do when one feels lost and unsure about having a crush for someone older than you and he is a professor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ok first off be honest about your feelings and circumstances. The real question you should ask is? Would you care what everyone will think when they see you two together? It so visually easy to see you're unsure feeling about the crush? Ok the crush is there forsure but. That public judgement…. That public view shouldn't matter but it does but not always.
